remove(Company) - Method in interface dao.CompanyDAO

remove(Company) - Method in class dao.db.CompanyDaoDb
 
remove(Coupon) - Method in class dao.db.CouponDaoDb
method to remove a coupon.
remove(Customer) - Method in class dao.db.CustomerDaoDb
removeing customet from the system .
removeCompany(Company) - Method in class facade.AdminFacade
When this method is used the company and all her coupons and all the coupons that clients bought from her will be erased .
removeCompany(Company, HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Admin_Rest_Facade
this rest method get (delete method) company bean from the front-end and remove it from the data base.
removeCompanyCoupons(long) - Method in class dao.db.CompanyDaoDb
 
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class facade.CompanyFacade
When a coupon is being removed its removed from the customers purchased coupons and from the table of the company coupons
removeCoupon(Coupon, HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Company_Rest_Facade
this method get coupon bean from the user and remove it from the database .
removeCustomer(Customer) - Method in class facade.AdminFacade
in this method the system removing a customer and all his coupons .
removeCustomer(Customer, HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Admin_Rest_Facade
this method get (using post) customer bean from the admin user and remove it from the data base .
removeCustomerCoupons(long) - Method in class dao.db.CustomerDaoDb
removing the coupons that the customer bought.
restorCompanyId(String, String) - Method in class dao.db.CompanyDaoDb
this method can help users to restore id
restoreId(String) - Method in class dao.db.CustomerDaoDb
this will help customers get the customet_id if they lost it or something.
returnConnection(Connection) - Method in class connectionPool.ConnectionPool
every method in the dbdao finished by returning the connection thay took .
run() - Method in class cleanerTask.TheCleanerTask
run will not work is the setQuit method called (it called in the closing of the program .
